name: Ronin Expo
description: We'll be serving delicious anime themed food at Ronin Expo. Theme TBD

name: Anime Impulse 2022
description: Our first anime convention! Come pick up an anime themed cookie & drink.

name: Riverside Lunar Festival
description: Doing our first ever anime themed pop-up! Stop by our Demon Slayer booth & grab a Hashira Bento.

name: Valentine's Day at the Galleria at Tyler
description: We invite you to grab a treat for you & your otaku sweetheart. We'll be selling cookies & other desserts at the Galleria at Tyler Mall at space 6510.

name: Eastvale Lunar Festival
description: Stop by our Demon Slayer inspired booth and pick up your Hashira Bento Box! It will definitely have you saying 'UMAI!'

name: Senpai Saturday Himawarii Event
description: Join us at the Himawarii 2nd Year Anniversary Event

name: Galleria at Tyler
description: We're back again, selling our classic and new anime-themed desserts to the local Riverside anime community. You can find us at space 6510 at the Galleria at Tyler Mall.

name: Anifest 2022
description: Anime con goers be sure to take a bite of our tasty fish tacos and a few delicious desserts. Find us at Food Booth Vendor - G11

name: popKULT Anime Social
description: Come join us for our first event with popKULT at Cravings by 99 Ranch Market. Lots of anime and food!

name: Boba Bear Anime Night
description: Join us for Boba Bear's first anime night!

name: Galleria at Tyler
description: We're back again, selling classic and new anime-themed desserts to the local Riverside anime community. You can find us at space 6510 at the Galleria at Tyler Mall.

name: Night in Teyvat
description: In collaboration with Little Eastern Cafe, Pop Umai will be hosting their first pop up event in a restaurant. Theme is Genshin Impact. Enjoy a meal surrounded by some of your favorite characters.

name: BizBaz @New Motion Brewery
description: Join us for our first time at San Diego! Food, games, drinks and lots of fun at this cool event

name: 909 Open Market
description: Join us for our first event at the 909 Open Market in Downtown Pomona. Bringing our anime treats and some delicious taiyaki

name: Back to Teyvat
description: We're back! Pop Umai is collaborating with Little Eastern Cafe to host our popular Genshin Impact fan event. Enjoy a delicious meal surrounded by some of your favorite characters and grab some merch from our vendors.  You don't want to miss out on this fun event!

name: Bearology Bake Sale
description: Join us for the Bearology Pasedena Bake sale!

description: We'll be serving delicious anime themed food at Ronin Expo. Theme TBD

name: Galleria at Tyler
description: We're back again, selling classic and new anime-themed desserts to the local Riverside anime community. You can find us at space 6510 at the Galleria at Tyler Mall.

name: ANIME Impulse OC
description: We're back for Anime Impulse but this time catch us at OC. A bunch of new treats since last time so you don't miss us!

name: AniMarketplace
description: Catch us at the AniMarketplace in JACCC. We're so excited to meet the Los Angeles community once again!

name: AVOX: Actors Voice Over Experience
description: Enjoy engaging with the English cast of so many of your favorite shows with an anime themed treat. Booth info coming soon.
